p: At the data cut‐off (18 October 2016), 60 patients (94%) had discontinued study treatment: 20 (31%) to undergo ASCT; 13 (20%) due to an AE; 13 (20%) due to progressive disease; 4 (6%) due to withdrawal of consent; 1 (2%) due to unsatisfactory therapeutic response; and 9 (14%) for other reasons (patient [ n = 4] or investigator [ n = 2] decision to discontinue treatment but continue follow‐up, health complications unrelated to study drug, patient removed, lost to follow‐up [each n = 1]). Four patients (6%) remained on study treatment (phase 1, n = 1; phase 2, n = 3).
